mapper.select: SELECT S_HASH AS hash FROM sheet_list ORDER BY s_seq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT S_HASH AS hash, S_CONTENT AS content FROM sheet_list
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sheet_list ( S_CONTENT, S_HASH, S_NAME, S_DNAME, S_LICENSE, S_DATE, S_PRES ) VALUES( #{content}, #{hash}, #{name}, #{dname}, #{license}, #{date}, #{pres} )
mapper.select: SET @ROWNUM:=#{pageNum}; SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS no, S_SEQ AS s_seq, S_NAME AS name, S_DNAME AS dname, S_DATE AS date, S_PRES AS pres FROM sheet_list LIMIT #{pageNum},10
